The trial test 2 treatment condition pre-diabetic men woman 25-60 year age metabolic syndrome . One hundred twenty men woman recruit , aim completer set 96 subject . Qualified Subjects randomize receive 1 2 test treatment base randomization schedule computer generate randomization schedule . Study treatment include : - Control ( CT ) diet plan least 1 serve low fat , low fiber , high glycemic carbohydrate eliminate avocado 7 day / week ( 5-7 day acceptable ) 12 week period . - Active treatment ( AT ) diet plan include 1 Avocado 7 days/week ( 5-7 day acceptable ) 12 week period . Each subject ask come one Screening Visit , 9 interim food pick-up/compliance visit 4 Test Day Visits . The four main Test Day visit occur week 0 ( day 1 ; baseline ) , end week 4 , end week 8 end week 12 . Interim Visits occur week 1 , 2 , 3 , 5 , 6 , 7 , 9 , 10 11 . Subjects pick-up study food , answer questionnaire , receive dietary counseling , confirm diet compliance interim visit . They also ask complete online 24 hour food recall per week study . Each 4 Test Day Visits last 2-3.5 h involve blood pressure ( BP ) measurement , fast blood sample collection anthropometric , body composition assessment . In addition , oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) perform week 0/day 1 end week 12/day .
